alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 6:42AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Spotty Freezing Drizzle This Morning... Lingering low-level moisture is allowing for some areas of drizzle, mist and flurries this morning for the Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Capital Region and Helderbergs, eastern Catskills, Taconics, Berkshires, northwestern Connecticut and the mid Hudson Valley. While temperatures are above freezing in many locations, some spots, especially in outlying and high terrain areas, are just below freezing. This may allow any light precipitation or mist to freeze on contact, creating a thin layer of ice. Use caution if traveling this morning, as any untreated surfaces may be slippery. Temperatures will be rising above freezing by later this morning.
